definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: We usually buy two-ply toilet paper.
sentences.chinese: 我們通常買雙層的廁紙。

sentences.english: After I did my business, I realized there was no toilet paper… and the water had been shut off months ago.
sentences.chinese: 等我拉完發現裏面沒有廁紙，並且這裏的水早就斷了。

sentences.english: It is pants of a bottom, a piece of lavatory paper , have its use.
sentences.chinese: 就算是一條底褲，一張廁紙，都有它的用處。

sentences.english: They might start with toilet paper.
With her parents, she rolled out the jumbo toilet paper, marked the halfway point, and folded it the first time.
sentences.chinese: 鋪開那捲龐大的廁紙，開始了第一次摺疊。

sentences.english: We have only been able to produce one roll at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 在現階段我們只生產出了一卷黃金廁紙。

sentences.english: In Europe and Latin America, up to 40% of toilet paper comes from recycled products.
sentences.chinese: 在歐洲和拉美，高達40%的廁紙是再生紙。

sentences.english: Check if there is a toilet paper before you sit dowm.
sentences.chinese: 在坐下去前先檢查有沒有廁紙。

sentences.english: Household goods ranging from toilet paper to clingfilm wereflung into the street from outdoor shelves in front of a drugstore.
sentences.chinese: 一家百貨商店的貨品從廁紙到保鮮膜散落一地。

sentences.english: The room service also messed up a few times as well;
sentences.chinese: 客房服務好混亂，廁紙也沒什麼換的。

sentences.english: Saving the planet, one toilet-roll tube at a time.
sentences.chinese: 挽救地球，一次用一卷廁紙。

sentences.english: They come from very poor villages where they've never seen electricity or toilet paper.
sentences.chinese: 他們從連電和廁紙都沒有的貧窮鄉村來到這裏。

sentences.english: My Master's degree on the wall is looking more and more like a roll of toilet paper.
sentences.chinese: 牆上的碩士學位證越看越像一張廁紙。

sentences.english: For a bed plus toiletries and toilet paper, the rate is $59.
sentences.chinese: 對於加了廁紙和衛生潔具的牀位，是59美元。

sentences.english: Paste the glue onto your balloon and cover with strips of tissue paper or kitchen roll.
sentences.chinese: 將膠水塗在氣球上並用廁紙或廚房捲紙片蓋住。

sentences.english: Check if there is a toilet paper before you sit down。
sentences.chinese: 在坐下去前先檢查有沒有廁紙。

definition: easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
one move, two gains (idiom); two birds with one stone
